thread.title: Mrs D Cunningham
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs D Cunningham

author: Mrs D Cunningham
title: Mrs D Cunningham
text: Ordered 3 roller blinds, and was so impressed with them and the customer service that I went bk online and ordered 4 more vertical blinds. All my friends have admired them and were impressed with the excellent price. It was just so easy to order and they all fit perfectly
